tags: my bois deserve all the love in the world
summary: I mean that fanfictions can be completely and utterly overwhelming.
body:
My Dilema With MHA Fanfiction

So, I have a problem…

For starters, here’s a bit about me. My AO3 name is CrimsonLion (no surprise there), and I currently have one fanfic under my name. It’s a vigilante Izuku fic, and it got a lot more attention than I thought it would (comment if you can relate). I decided to take a break from reading other fanfic (I’ve already started suffering in small bits from withdrawl, and its barely been a week) because I wanted more time to finish school stuff (and write my own fanfiction, lol). But that’s not what I’m here to talk about.

I’m here to talk about how amazing and overwhelming fanfiction is.

Let’s start with the amazing part first: among the trash of low quality fics, some fanfics are…

Absolutely. Fantastic!

[TL;DR: There’s a lot of good fanfics out there and they all deserve love and respect.]

I have a handful of bookmarks from AO3 that I won’t get to read for a while. (Read: My self imposed ban is 44 days. It should be 40, but the happens to be during the extent of Lent, and they exclude Sundays.) A few I can think of at the top of my head are “Total Command,” this really well written Dekubowl fic where nearly everyone’s a girl except for Izuku (it’s definitely worth a read or 12). There’s also “Dis(associate),” where Izuku has a quirk that allows him to separate from his body. Then there’s “The Life of Deku and His Characters,” which is both fun and heart-wrenching and almost everyone is gonna want to kill Baka- I mean, Katsuki Bakugo. Almost everything by “BeyondTheClouds777” and “Jale_Seigneur” is top-tier goodness, and there are other more recent fics which have caught my eye, but that’s a story for another time. Whether your into fluff, angst, crack, or something else entirely, fanfic most likely has it for you. The MHA fanfic community is where I reside, and it’s astounding (good or bad) at the ideas people can come up with. There are so many!

Which brings me to the overwhelming part. What do I mean by that?

I mean that fanfictions can be completely and utterly overwhelming.

I’m not just talking about reading fanfiction, either! The fanfic I mentioned I had before is called “Lost Cause;” it’s my first foray into this whole MHA AU web that fanfic has created. Oh yeah, did I forget to mention that in fanfic, MHA basically has the multiverse?

That’s my problem; it’s not a bad problem, but still.

I haven’t finished “Lost Cause” yet, but I have, like, six or so fic ideas floating around my head. …and it’s frustrating! The real world still exists, so I can’t dedicate all my time to fanfiction, and I also have IRL obligations to ensure I get good grades and don’t live in poverty when I get older. That being said, THE POSSIBILITIES FOR MHA AUS ARE ENDLESS. We’re talking Undertale AUs meet Into The Spider-Verse kinds of variety. I want to write so many alternate takes on the MHA Universe! But I can only do it one at a time! Unless…

Nah, that’s something for future me to do. Present me needs to enjoy his Spring Break. Thanks for indulging me! Comment and like if you agree that the struggle is real!

CrimsonLion (12 March 2019)

blog.description: Things BNHA characters most definitely never said (sadly).

summary: Toga Himiko : Let me join the League of Villains. F**k the police! F**k the government! F**k the establishment! Shigaraki Tomura...
body:
Toga Himiko : Let me join the League of Villains. F**k the police! F**k the government! F**k the establishment!

Shigaraki Tomura : …Toga, this is a crypto-fascist organization. We want to BECOME the establishment.

Toga Himiko : Good! I need someone to f**k me!

summary:
Twice: Alright, Shigaraki, truth, or dare?
Shigaraki: Truth.
Twice: Is it true that you have a dakimakura?
Shigaraki: Who the...
body:
Twice: Alright, Shigaraki, truth, or dare?
Shigaraki: Truth.
Twice: Is it true that you have a dakimakura?
Shigaraki: Who the hell started that rumor?!
Dabi: [starts snickering]
Shigaraki: Well, no, I do not.
Shigaraki: Alright then. Dabi, truth or dare?
Dabi: Why don't you dare me~?
Shigaraki: I dare you to do a thousand piece puzzle…
Dabi: [is feeling nervous]
Shigaraki: …but you have to start with the middle pieces.
Dabi: You…are truly the most evil thing to walk this earth.

dialogue.label: Twice:

summary: I just wanna say that your blog gives me life by allowing me to vent my anger and disgust at the purple thing. Also, I think...
question: I just wanna say that your blog gives me life by allowing me to vent my anger and disgust at the purple thing. Also, I think it's insulting to grapes to use them to describe Mineta. I was eating purple grapes the other day and noticed they had more character than him.
answer: you’re right, we need to collectively apologize to grapes everywhere for associating them with him

summary: [ Pending Orders Update ] Goods Arrived Parcelforce delivered today! But I’ve mixed emotions... The 2 delayed rubber straps?...
caption:
[ Pending Orders Update ] Goods Arrived

Parcelforce delivered today! But I’ve mixed emotions…

The 2 delayed rubber straps? Looking great and I’ll ship your packages tomorrow. :)

The BNHA acrylic stands? Not up to standard imo. :/

It’s frustrating that they actually show up decent when photographed, but irl the graphic quality is not sharp enough. This supplier provided many of our usual BNHA, Love Live Sunshine, Bungo Stray Dogs acrylic goods, so it’s very disappointing that they offered a batch like this without prior disclosure. :////

>> What Next?

I reserved these goods with a certain expectation and priced them accordingly. Having seen them irl now, I don’t think they worth that and I don’t want to sell them. :/ Being a factory extras group doesn’t mean any old shit is acceptable, you know!

Those of you who reserved items, I’ll be in touch later to discuss options. 

I am not loving this batch, but I don’t want to hang onto dozens of them either. Should I do them as like an add-on item? If you order something, then you can get these for £2 each? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

(the EMS shipping alone was £45 lmao ARGHHH I’m pissed about this batch)

reblog.comment:
[ Pending Orders Update ] Goods Arrived

Parcelforce delivered today! But I’ve mixed emotions…

The 2 delayed rubber straps? Looking great and I’ll ship your packages tomorrow. :)

The BNHA acrylic stands? Not up to standard imo. :/

It’s frustrating that they actually show up decent when photographed, but irl the graphic quality is not sharp enough. This supplier provided many of our usual BNHA, Love Live Sunshine, Bungo Stray Dogs acrylic goods, so it’s very disappointing that they offered a batch like this without prior disclosure. :////

>> What Next?

I reserved these goods with a certain expectation and priced them accordingly. Having seen them irl now, I don’t think they worth that and I don’t want to sell them. :/ Being a factory extras group doesn’t mean any old shit is acceptable, you know!

Those of you who reserved items, I’ll be in touch later to discuss options. 

I am not loving this batch, but I don’t want to hang onto dozens of them either. Should I do them as like an add-on item? If you order something, then you can get these for £2 each? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

(the EMS shipping alone was £45 lmao ARGHHH I’m pissed about this batch)

trail.content_raw:
[ Pending Orders Update ] Goods Arrived

Parcelforce delivered today! But I’ve mixed emotions…

The 2 delayed rubber straps? Looking great and I’ll ship your packages tomorrow. :)

The BNHA acrylic stands? Not up to standard imo. :/

It’s frustrating that they actually show up decent when photographed, but irl the graphic quality is not sharp enough. blog.name: sfw-bnha-nsfw
blog.title: B[ANA]NHA
blog.description:
A Boku no Hero Academia Imagines Blog

Requests: OPEN

Admin Emmy of @sfw-haikyuu-nsfw

summary: Hey love! How would Dabi, Shigaraki, and Mr. Compress comfort their s/o? S/o could have anxiety, depression, just had a bad day...
question: Hey love! How would Dabi, Shigaraki, and Mr. Compress comfort their s/o? S/o could have anxiety, depression, just had a bad day -- up to you.
answer:
Ya know, I knew I would have to write for villains in this, but I didn’t anticipate how hard it would be, lol! Especially when I’m trying to be uplifting for the students I’m around!

Hope that you enjoy, darling!

Initially, Dabi hadn’t anticipated on saying anything when he had seen them curled under the blankets of his bed. 

He usually didn’t.

There were things that typically took precedence over how they were feeling on any given day. They knew this. They more than knew this, they lived the same dream as him as a member of the League of Villains. 

His turquoise eyes strayed on them for a second longer than they generally did. It gave him pause. A long enough pause to consider where he was off to in such a rush anyway. With the corner of his mouth falling in the slightest, he felt his body compelled to move towards the lump that was them on his mattress.

The bed gave underneath the weight of his knee as he maneuvered to place himself behind them, his hand falling to their hip, his breath rustling the hair at the back of their neck. He saw them shift to look back at him, was sure that there was a question to be asked about his behavior, but he saw no indication of it within their eyes. 

Silence filled the space around them, each individual waiting for the other to address the mood encompassing the room.

“What if we fail?” They finally asked.

Shigaraki’s body stiffened against theirs at the suggestion of failing in their mission. That very idea was unacceptable. The fact that they were even doubting was something he would not tolerate. As soon as there was one weak link, their entire operation was going to fall apart. And he’d stop at nothing to ensure his goal was met.

He felt them shift against him and he let himself relax back into the surface of the mattress. He was the leader of the League of Villains, he couldn’t allow himself to make such outlandish comments, especially not to someone he considered one of his closest allies. 

“Failure is not an option,” he kept his voice steady, the need to squash their anxieties in order to get them back to the main path of their mission. To dismantle the hero system. To prove them as the false heroes they are. To kill All Might. “We are fighting for the truth. The truth that has been denied to the world,” his voice began to come out in a growl, “Heroes like All Might is what is wrong with this world. And we’re going to destroy them all.”

They shifted again, this time to turn and face him, their movement forcing Shigaraki’s hand away from their body so that his quirk wasn’t activated. Only when they had stopped moving did he resettle his fingers against their waist. They had felt down about their mission, about the lack of success that they had had as of late. But, of course, victor would not come easily. They had to fight hard to what they believed. And fight they would.

“You’re right,” they breathed a sigh of relief, allowing themselves to ease into Sako’s chest, “there is no other option but success.” A smile touched at their lips and they felt all of their anxieties rush from their body.

“Of course, I am!” His fingers moved away from their waist, rising to brush the hair that was dangerously close to falling over their face. He let the soft strands tangle between his fingers as he pushed them back behind their ear. “This mission is what we were put on this earth to do, the grandest of opportunities to show the world just how wrong they had been!” He laughed as he shifted closer to them. “Just think of how the world will worship us after we succeed.”

The comment sparked something in them, just like everything else he said. The man had a way of creating this perfect image of the future within their head, one that they wanted to come true no matter the circumstances. If the future was as marvelous as Sako made it out to be then they wanted nothing else than to live within it beside him.

“I cannot wait,” and they couldn’t. They would do everything to make sure they were in that world he described. Without heroes. Without All Might.
